name: Beach Runner (itch)
description:
Survive a beach filled with crabs and turtles, with 4 different ice lolly flavours.

  1. Green Lolly - Go faster
  2. Red Lolly - Slow down
  3. Purple - Anti Crab Missile
  4. Yellow - Anti Turtle Missile

Controls:  Arrow Keys for movement

#icantdraw Game Jam -  Theme:  Beach
